sect1.para: If &slsreg; needs to be installed on a number of systems or partitions, it is recommended you create a network installation source. The same source can also be used for the concurrent installation on several partitions or several systems. The configuration of a network installation source is described in .
The installation can be controlled with a VNC client. For more information about VNC, see .
